reviews.text: I loveeeee the pizza here! I'm not the type of person that's picky about pizza- i love thin crust, thick crust, saucy, whatever! But harvest is just a...
Ordered from the BD location for the first time last night. And first time ordering a pizza in like 10 years. I've been to the Bexley location a couple...
Great pizza and drinks! Was a great location for a monthly book club with various food preferences.
